name: Good Morning
instruction: Stand up tall with your feet shoulder-width apart and place your hands behind the head. Start bending at the hips, push your hips back and bend over to near parallel. Return to the starting position and repeat.
hints: Keep your back tight, shoulder blades pinched together, and your knees slightly bent. Do the movement slowly and breathe out as you lower your torso. Breathe in as you get back up and squeeze the glutes at the end of each repetition.
